post.text: "Donald Trump says stuff every day that used to be considered as disqualifying for being president." â€”President Obama

comment.author: Jillian
comment.text: So true Obama. Trump is a joke fraud. He is a traitor with Putin. deplorable. Hillary the stable, experienced and real candidate. My family will be voting Hillary. NEVERTRASHTRUMP!

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: If she lives that long...Oh, wait! You wouldn't know anything about that...Because she covered it up!

replies.author: Jillian
replies.text: Justin She is back on the trail tomorrow. You could never do what she has for 15 months. So she got pneumonia, My sister had walking pneumonia 3 times as a kid and is great health at 65. Big deal. Trump needs to show his lying cheating crooked taxes. He is a bum and not qualified to be president. He is joke of the world and would ruin our country. He is a KGB agent for Russia. He needs to go to Putin's house and get in bed with him. Fraud traitor.

replies.author: Jillian
replies.text: VOTING FOR A REAL CANDIDATE Hillary Clinton! BIGOT LIKE YOUR TRASHY CANDIDATE.

replies.author: Brandi
replies.text: Trump is Putin's traitor??? Did trump scrap the nuclear missile defence system in Poland and Czech Republic (because Putin didn't like it)? Did Trump pushed the proverbial "reset" button with Russia (Obama and Clinton did in 2009). Was it under Trump's watch that Crimea was annexed???? pleeeeeeeeese.

replies.author: Lindsey
replies.text: Hahaha She's a liar. Not one computer got infected with a virus but infected with the truth. What's she going to say about these new ones???? https://pjmedia.com/trending/2016/09/14/interim-dnc-chair-warns-not-to-look-at-new-hack-could-have-malware/
